_sText:
dm_hall_of_aim by BaShoR
for mTw.Mindfactory

The Map was inspired by surf_XIV and built in more than 1 year of work.
We used over 40 new customtextures and tried to combine fun with performance and style.

The Map is built for 2on2 up to 6on6.
Optimal Settings for the map are TeamDeathmatchMod (by bailopan), 3.5 Minutes roundtime, no awp, Noblock addon (http://addons.eventscripts.com/addons/view/Noblock).
The Startroom is Protected from damaging other Players.

Video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rpq0AgYYBTw
